components.description:
A yellow face with simple, open eyes and no mouth, as if at a loss for words. Meaning widely varies, but commonly conveys speechlessness, humility, and silence. May also convey moderately negative emotions, such as disappointment, frustration, or sadness. 

Samsung’s design previously featured raised eyebrows and blushing cheeks.
components.title: Face Without Mouth

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
Fog, as obscures visibility. Generally depicted as a square of a gray, hazy, cloud-like mass.

May be used as a weather icon to represent foggy conditions. May also be used to represent metaphorical fog (e.g., a daze).

Not to be confused with üåÅ Foggy, though their applications may overlap.

Microsoft’s design was previously a stylized depiction of fog, featuring three, wavy lines, as was Google’s previous design. Samsung’s fog previously resembled three clouds. Twitter’s design previously resembled its üåÅ Foggy emoji, showing fog obscuring the Golden Gate Bridge.
components.title: Fog

description:
A face that appears surrounded by clouds or a haze of smoke. Ambiguous in appearance, this may represent a foggy state of mind, confusion, or even a sense of calm bliss.

May also be used to indicate the presence of smoke.
title: Face in Clouds
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the face in clouds emoji presents a serene, almost ethereal countenance peeking through soft, billowing white clouds. Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and gentle gradients create a dreamlike atmosphere, suggesting a state of blissful distraction or a moment of profound thought. This emoji is perfectly rendered on Apple devices to convey feelings of being lost in thought, daydreaming, or experiencing a moment of pure, unadulterated peace.
